item.description:
Hi All
Hope you are having a great summer. I'm hosting another dance, on Saturday, August 8th once again in Malden.
The last 3 dances here have had over 200 people, and have really turned into a favorite for many.
Here are the details.

Anthony's of Malden, 105 Canal St., Malden
The dance floor is big, the room very nice, Light Hor's douevres are delicious, great music, friendly crowd.
Saturday, August 8th the dance starts @ 8pm.
$10 at the door.

At 7pm we have a free Meet & Greet in the lounge, with some free cheese & crackers.

I hope to see you there, and don't forget to say Hi and introduce yourself.

Thanks
Angelo
item.name: Dance Dance Dance
